coreAttributes.name: Bubble Cream
coreAttributes.description: A small pot of yoghurt, with a black-and-white cow-pattern styled onto the lid. A label on the side declares it to be 'Bubble Cream', which seems to be a little misleading, as there isn't any sort of bubbling going on in the creamy mixture contained within.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel a lot stronger...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 3)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(peel)] back the foil lid to reveal the Bubble Cream's contents. Despite this product being called 'Cream', it's actually a thick yoghurt that's contained within. Detaching the tiny wooden spoon that was stuck to one side, [npc.name] eagerly [npc.verb(dig)] in to the creamy mixture, letting out satisfied little humming noises as [npc.she] [npc.verb(discover)] that it's quite possibly the most delicious yoghurt that [npc.sheHas] ever tasted.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(peel)] back the foil lid to reveal the Bubble Cream's contents, before handing it over to [npc2.name] for [npc2.herHim] to eat. Despite this product being called 'Cream', it's actually a thick yoghurt that's contained within. Detaching the tiny wooden spoon that was stuck to one side, [npc2.name] eagerly [npc2.verb(dig)] in to the creamy mixture, letting out satisfied little humming noises as [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(discover)] that it's quite possibly the most delicious yoghurt that [npc2.sheHas] ever tasted.
